Recap: Starr is ready to take a bus to Atlantic City to have the abortion. And she has a plan to have Langston wearing a "Starr wig" so that everybody will think she is Starr. But there plan is not likely to work when both Marco and Cole see Langston at school dressed as Starr, know that Starr is gone and ask what is going on. Antonio is very suspicious of not only John but of Nash. He warns Cristian and Jessica both that Nash takes women from their men. Nash and Sara return from their trip to Napa and return to their respective partners. But they clearly look like they might be more than business associates. Natalie confronts Sara for going off with Nash. And it looks like she might be avoiding dealing with her feelings regarding Jared.
Transcript: Natalie: John, I'm sorry, but you and Talia -- I don't -- I don't get it.
John: Things just happen. We both know that.
Natalie: Talia was with Antonio, and this isn't -- this isn't you, you don't do this.
John: I don't want to talk about either one of them.
Natalie: What do you want to talk about? Why did you come here?

Todd: When she leaves school, is she -- you know, is she with friends, is she laughing?
Shaun: I can't remember the last time I heard your daughter laugh.
